description.text: Your primary weapon keeps a foe off balance, allowing you to slip your off-hand weapon past his defenses.

sections.Benefit: While using Two-Weapon Fighting to make melee attacks, you can forgo your first primary-hand melee attack to make a Bluff check to feint an opponent. If you successfully feint, that opponent is denied his Dexterity bonus to AC until the end of your turn.
